snippet: This weekend at AT&T Park, the Dodgers and Giants meet for the first time since the Dodgers’ industry-rattling trade last month, with the Giants holding a four-and-a-half-game lead.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column on the Los Angeles Dodgers, who are preparing to face the San Francisco Giants; notes that Dodgers and Giants have always had one of baseball's fiercest rivalries, transplanted together from New York to California in 1958.
lead_paragraph: This weekend at AT&T Park, the Dodgers and Giants meet for the first time since the Dodgers’ industry-rattling trade last month, with the Giants holding a four-and-a-half-game lead.

headline.seo: Dodgers and Giants Rejuvenate Old Rivalry
headline.main: Dodgers and Giants Rejuvenate a Rivalry
headline.print_headline: Dodgers and Giants Rejuvenate a Rivalry
